org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer.enumeration

Class StageAssignmentTraversal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.util.OneTimeExecutable
      • org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer.enumeration.StageAssignmentTraversal

  • public class StageAssignmentTraversal
extends OneTimeExecutable
    Builds an ExecutionPlan from a ExecutionTaskFlow.

    Specifically, subdivides the ExecutionTasks into PlatformExecutions and ExecutionStages, thereby discarding already executed ExecutionTasks.

    As of now, these are recognized as producers of Channels that are copied (see Channel.isCopy()). This is because of ExecutionTaskFlowCompiler that copies Channels to different alternative ExecutionPlans on top of existing fixed ExecutionTasks.

      Criterion to futher split InterimStage besides precedence.
